metadata.title: CVE-2017-0810 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A remote code execution vulnerability in the Android media framework(libmpeg2). Product: Android. Versions: 6.0, 6.0.1, 7.0, 7.1.1, 7.1.2, 8.0.Android ID: A-38207066.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
